creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
text:
jserv_pool is defined mod_jserv.c which the "grep" did not find.  I am
assuming that the error is due to a bad copy of the source.

For query purposes, mark as fixed in Tomcat 3.2 and up:
Fixed in Tomcat 3.2
Fixed in Tomcat 3.2.1
Fixed in Tomcat 3.2.2
Fixed in Tomcat 3.3
